name: LINKIES (itch) (Lio Lim)
description:
Play as Limey and Pinkie, joined together by an unbreakable bond! Explore a massive world in this physics-based 2D platformer with the Linkies!

Controls:
Left/Right to swing your partner around
Up/Down to change the length of your link
R to restart from checkpoint

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021
Theme: Joined Together

Assets by https://kenney.nl/
